page.title: 01HOLT TOWN TODAY
page.content: THE MAIN ROAD THAT RUNS THROUGH{HOLT FROM{WREXHAM}TO{FARNDON}IS CALLED THE{ A534.THIS ROAD IS RELATIVELY STRAIGHT BUT IT HAS TWO VERY DANGEROUS CORNERS. ALTHOUGH MANY PEOPLE THINK THAT HOLT IS A VILLAGE IT IS IN FACT A TOWN.BEFORE WREXHAM WAS BUILT,HOLT WAS A MAJOR TOWN IN THIS AREA. IN THE CENTRE OF HOLT STANDS THE CROSS.THIS IS A MEMORIAL TO ALL OF THE SOLDIERS WHO DIED IN THE 1st AND 2nd WORLD WAR.IN THE PAST THIS AREA OF HOLT WAS WHERE THE MARKETS WERE HELD. MOST OF HOLT SHOPS SURROUND THE CROSS. THERE IS :- 1. JIMS-FOOD STORE 2. TEDS-GENERAL STORE 3. OFF-LICENCE 4. POST-OFFICE 5. VIDEO SHOP 6. FISH & CHIP SHOP 7.BETTING OFFICE
